text: Alevtina Pavlovna Kolchina ( alternate spelling: Alevtina Koltsjina; 11 November 1930 â€“ 1 March 2022) was a Soviet cross-country skier. She competed in four Winter Olympics, earning a total of five medals. Kolchina died on 1 March 2022, at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Olympic gold medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic silver medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Olympic bronze medalists for the Soviet Union Category:Soviet skiers
title: Alevtina Kolchina
